name: How do I publish my content in other languages?
title: How do I publish my content in other languages?
body:
If you have configured your Help Centre to support multiple languages, you can publish content in your supported languages.

Here's the workflow for localising your Help Centre content into other languages:

  1. Get your content translated in the other languages.
  2. Configure the Help Centre to support all your languages.
  3. Add the translated content to the Help Centre.
  4. I am making this change in the article

For complete instructions, see Localising the Help Centre.
